pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw: I don't know if you're familiar with nested models (here's a [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=nested_model&cat=build_robot) and an [example world](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/42215f2019f5ae64fc8a0610ef804a0fc53b0740/worlds/nested_model.world?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default)), but I think to handle them properly we should use `GetScopedName` and replace `::` with `/` like was done in [Link.cc here](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/42215f2019f5ae64fc8a0610ef804a0fc53b0740/gazebo/physics/Link.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#Link.cc-1663:1664). The `joint_cmd` topic should be updated too, but we could save that for a separate PR. It would also be nice to use nested models in one of the tests.
